Diadem of Gold
Bolton Town Hall, Bolton, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes - 1st £250 and trophy, 2nd £150 and trophy. 5 bands competed.
Sept. 8, 2013, 12:27 p.m. June 22, 2016, 9:48 a.m.

4 Warburtons Bakery Band Mike Cotter
